attributes.additional_details:
Enable the UK public to determine Government policy independent of party politics. The Scottish independence referendum shows that we, the public, can be engaged with politics (87% turnout) when the cause matters to us.

Allow us to choose referendums on what matters to us, not just what the political parties tell us we have permission to decide. For example, use a larger cut-off for epetitions (such as 2.5 million) to trigger a referendum on a question.
